name: BOALZ
description:
This game for 86 Mini Jam (Theme: Sports , Limitation: No Stopping)

The slogan of this game is "If you are the ball so you have to run"

CONTROLS: MOVE - A and D , JUMP - Space , DOUBLE JUMP - Space.

You are the ball and your goal is to reach the basketball hoop. The game has orange and purple platforms , you are an orange ball and therefore you can only walk on orange ones. Every 2-3 seconds, the platforms change their color to the opposite.Therefore, you can not stop , there is a double jump in the game , but it can only be used if you jump from the platform , if the platform falls under you, then you will have only one jump .The level is difficult , I tried to pass 10 minutes . Try to pass for yourself.
